definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Maybe if you ate some of that makeup you could be pretty on the inside.
sentences.chinese: 你買點兒化妝品吧，吃了，增加一些內在美。

sentences.english: Beauty has double characteristics both in appearance and in immanence.
sentences.chinese: 美兼具外在美與內在美的雙重特性。

sentences.english: Would you rather be beautiful on the outside or on the inside?
sentences.chinese: 你更願意擁有外在美還是內在美呢？

sentences.english: They believe thatoutside beauty doesn't matter so much and inner beauty is more important thanthat.
sentences.chinese: 他們相信外在美沒那麼重要，內在美比這更重要。

sentences.english: The product cares not only the skin externally, but also whitens internally, may help you to get a hydrated skin quality.
sentences.chinese: 外在潤色，內在美白，創作發現如初露珠凝般的膚質。

sentences.english: Having "inner beauty" is just as important as being outwardly beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 擁有內在美和外在美同樣重要。

sentences.english: Work on your inner beauty too.
sentences.chinese: 除了外在美，內在美也要重視。

definition: to show off/to make a display of
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
